DOC.brief_summary: Study ass PK/PD parameter safety tolerability study medication age group
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics , Safety Tolerability Dabigatran Etexilate Solution Children 1 < 2 Years Age
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1. male females 1 less 2 year age 2. objective diagnosis primary venous thromboembolism 3. completion plan treatment course low molecular weight heparin oral anticoagulant primary venous thromboembolism 4. write informed consent parent ( legal guardian ) patient assent ( applicable ) Exclusion criterion : 1. weight less 9 kg 2. condition associate increase risk bleed 3. patient condition would allow safe participation study Note : Further exclusion criterion apply
